SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.repositories

Class AbstractRepository<T extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.repositories.AbstractRepository<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The entity type this repository manages, must implement Serializable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivationTokenRepository, AppraisalRepository, ConfigurationRepository, CourseRepository, CycleRepository, FinishedCourseRepository, MessageRepository, NotificationRepository, PasswordResetTokenRepository, TemporaryUserRepository, UserRepository
public abstract class AbstractRepository<T extends Serializable> extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract base repository class providing common CRUD operations for JPA entities.

This class serves as a foundation for entity-specific repositories, implementing standard data access patterns with transaction management.

See Also:
